name: Ledged of the Fairy Escape
description:
"The evil Grimmer has captured Cory the fairy and taken their wings! Jump, Dash and wall ride your way through Grimmers evil castle, regain your wings and save the Papalions."

2D precision platforming!
4 unique levels to traverse!
Shadow Cory!
Amazing power ups!
Cool dash move!

Student game. 2D platformer, developed by Blobo Games Studios at The Game Assembly.

Credits:

Artists 
Henrik Andersson - Pontus Canbäck - Olof Enroth

Level Designers
Oscar Maris - Vera Pedersen

Programmers
Niklas Andersson - Robin Eriksson - Emma Göransson - Sedin Mesic -
Henrik Phan
